price: Inni kun waan isa mamaa turtan sani” (isaaniin jedhama).
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā mā kuntum bihi tamtarūna
